headline: Full Stack Developer
summary: Software Engineering at Imperial College London. Currently at Facebook Engineering. Former intern at Goldman Sachs and Intel.

educations.description:
• Expected Graduation: Jun 2021 with First Class Honours
Dean's list (Top 10%) & First Class Honours in the 2017-2018 and 2018-2019 Academic Years
• Key modules: High Level Programming (F#), Machine Learning, Object-Oriented Software Engineering (C++, Java),  Computer Architecture (ARM, MIPS), Network and Web Security, Operations Research, Embedded Systems, Compilers, Digital Electronics (FPGA, Verilog)
educations.activities:
• Malaysian Night (Music Director, Marketing Officer)
• Lion Dance Team

jobPositions.description:
• Intel IoTG Audio/IO Team
• Developed and maintained audio drivers (C, Python) on Linux automotive infotainment systems
• Cooperated with Intel teams in Germany, China and India to deliver top-notch audio solutions
• Part of a trained Scrum software team, responsibilities included creating performance indicators and burndown charts for review in team retrospectives
jobPositions.title: Embedded Software Engineering Intern
Summer Analyst
jobPositions.description:
• Equities Post-Execution Technology Team
• Received graduate and placement offer
• Implemented new FX trade booking system (SecDB Slang) with robust exception handling, regional and database ring consistency, and state handling to replace legacy systems. The system handles more than 500 trades per day around the world.
• Worked with equities analysts to implement stock netting algorithm to optimally allocate risks in trading desks

projects.title: Portosaurus
projects.description: A free portfolio webpage generator that lets users create, customise and host their personal portfolio webpages. One of two full-stack developers of this project.
Cross-platform webapp that features a motion-detection page turner, chromatic tuner, piano audio to MIDI converter (ML) and other state-of-the-art music practice tools.
projects.title: TuneApp
Hirelah
projects.description: Co-founder and full-stack developer at Hirelah. Hirelah has 1000+ sign-ups - candidates have received over 200 internship offers from 50+ companies (as of June 2020).

projects.title: Interpolatory
projects.description: Intel-sponsored group project to study hardware video frame interpolation. Responsible for researching and implementing ML algorithms and building a software simulation tool.

projects.title: VSLilyPond
projects.description: Provides seamless support for LilyPond to write music in VSCode. Features syntax & error highlighting, IntelliSense & AutoComplete, compilation on save, and MIDI input & playback.
VSCode extension that emulates ARM and MIPS CPUs. Proof-of-concept educational tool for Imperial College London. ARM backend written in F#, MIPS in C++.
projects.title: VisUAL2++
Verishot
projects.description: An educational tool used to teach basic Verilog to university students. Features a Verilog block diagram visualiser and circuit simulator. Tooling and visualiser lead of F# group project.

projects.title: ThinkTank
projects.description: Group IoT embedded systems project: low-cost water tank quality monitoring device. Lead developer primarily involved in front- and back-end infrastructure. Highlights include building a voice assistant.
C Compiler capable of transpiling C to Python and compiling C to MIPS. Lead of pair project. Runner-up in best compiler at Imperial College London.
projects.title: C Compiler
